net.majorkernelpanic.streaming.rtp

Class AACADTSPacketizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.majorkernelpanic.streaming.rtp.AbstractPacketizer
      • net.majorkernelpanic.streaming.rtp.AACADTSPacketizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class AACADTSPacketizer
extends AbstractPacketizer
implements java.lang.Runnable
    RFC 3640. This packetizer must be fed with an InputStream containing ADTS AAC. AAC will basically be rewrapped in an RTP stream and sent over the network. This packetizer only implements the aac-hbr mode (High Bit-rate AAC) and each packet only carry a single and complete AAC access unit.
